Header.title: Islam and sufism
Header.paragraph: Sufiya-e-Karaam have only this manifesto, “Everyone’s well-being, everyone’s good”.

Testimonials.text: "Whoever comes into this hospice, give him food and do not ask him about his belief because whoever has been granted life by Allah is worth coming at Abul-Hasan’s table."
Testimonials.name: sheikh abdul hasan kharqani

Testimonials.text: "From Turkey to Syria, even if a thorn pricks someone’s finger it hurts me. Similarly, from Turkey to Syria if a stone hurts someone’s feet, I feel its wound and if there is some sorrow in anyone’s heart, that grieved heart is mine."
Testimonials.name: sheikh abdul hasan kharqani

Testimonials.text: "Every morning the scholars ask for increase in their knowledge, the pious ask for increase in their piety but I ask God for only that thing which brings pleasure to my brothers."
Testimonials.name: sheikh abdul hasan kharqani
